extendedInfo.description: *** NEW LEVEL ADDED ***If the games lags, turn off Image Effects in the Options menu!I can't tell you how much it means to me to get up every morning and read all the compliments and useful suggestions from you all.  You guys rock!If you like the game, please rate.  5 star ratings help get updates and more features!Slender Man! is a brand new 3D survival horror game based upon the Slender Man (slenderman) legend. See how long you can survive before Slender Man gets you, with only your wits to aid you!Can you find all the hidden pages before Slender Man gets you?We promise to respond promptly to suggestions and and bugs.  Just send me e-mail and be sure to include what device you are running on.Please note that the game itself is in English.NOTE: Samsung Galaxy Y user have reported issues.  Some older ARM6 phones may not be able to run correctly. Sorry.

reviews.title: I hope to see the next levels
reviews.comment: Have you ever thought of making a level lf the mount saint Hellens ape caves? It is the perfect environment for a horror film and it is extremely dark.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I like how this game can be turned onto a tablet and you can play it just like the original. Nice job man. :D
reviews.author: Jeremy Conklin

reviews.title: PLEASE READ THIS!
reviews.comment: This game is awesome and I really like it. although there are a few flaws: 1. Please add more stages to choose from and more conditions like night vision and stormy night. A few examples of stages you could have are: mansion or a mental hospital or a prison and a haunted forest or a desolate town. 2. This game is a bit too easy. Try making him a bit creepier and make easy mode tougher because even on hard I don\'t get much of a challenge. Although I do like how challenging it is to find each sign.
reviews.author: Jared Caldwell

reviews.title: Nvidia shield
reviews.comment: Please add controls for nvidia shield :)  would love to an with my nubs other than that great game keep up the work!  ^^
reviews.author: Brandon Le

reviews.title: Super happy for game 2
reviews.comment: This game is amazing!!!!! I am so excited for slender man chapter 2!!!!!If u could ,do u mind telling me the exact date it should come to the Google play store,....please?
reviews.author: Malinda Gauruder

reviews.title: Nice little game.
reviews.comment: Bought the game because of the new level, and because I enjoyed playing it on a buddy\'s phone. Glad I did, update is nice, controls are pretty solid, and haven\'t notice any in-game lag.  Edit: polishing up chapter 2, huh? Can not wait. I have been checking the webpage frequently for news on chapter 2. Awesome!
reviews.author: David Carter

reviews.title: Love the game, but
reviews.comment: I\'m having trouble reaching inside a place Only in the farm level. Like there\'s a tiny ledge that I can\'t get over no matter which direction I come at it. I know it is an area that should be accessible because there is a note INSIDE, but I just can\'t walk in.  There\'s no jump button, so I don\'t know what to do.
reviews.author: Eric Mu\303\261oz

reviews.title: Good game but needs more
reviews.comment: I think its OK but, slender man is not scary because he has no face at all and looks like he is going out on a date......I like how it gives you the open world feeling but it needs more then just running and collecting pictures, it should be more like a mystery open world were you can go into buildings and collect clue items outside or inside and weapons as well and it should have a story line to it. I have it three stars but I would like to see a slender man open world mystery story type game.
reviews.author: Jeremy Smith

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I dig it. Pretty scary at night time alone.
reviews.author: Matt Fowler

reviews.title: Great yet eerie game!
reviews.comment: My kids love the suspense and the creepy possibility that slenderman could be standing waiting for you right around the corner!!!
reviews.author: Anita Silva

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: What I said cool
reviews.author: Jesus Daniel Tarre

reviews.title: Best slender
reviews.comment: This is the best version of slender, and one the best mobile horror game. Great ambiance and sound affects
reviews.author: gabriel palomares

reviews.title: Fix bugs!!
reviews.comment: I loved this game until the update. When I play the road and get off the road I have to move sideways to get back on. Please fix!
reviews.author: Jarred Guajardo

reviews.title: Update made it buggy
reviews.comment: There are a few (obvious) problems with the game now. First, I get stuck on the road. I mean I\'m trying to walk into the road, and have to walk from side to side to find the correct collision point so I can walk onto the road And second, There are floating trees all over the place. Which isn\'t too much of a problem unless there was a page on one and I couldn\'t collect it because it was too high. And that\'s just The Road! I haven\'t even played The Farm!
reviews.author: Kevin Flowers

reviews.title: Slender
reviews.comment: Best slender on the mobile!
reviews.author: Ben Montgomery

reviews.title: Would be five stars
reviews.comment: I\'d give it five stars but slenderman doesn\'t get close to you at all other than that tho this is great game but not scary because how far away he is please work on it =(
reviews.author: Andrew Maize

reviews.title: Excellent developer.
reviews.comment: 5 stars for the best mobile version of Slender. Great work!
reviews.author: Toby Sturm

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is the scariest and the best game ever, keep up with the great work!!
reviews.author: Jack Blackwell

reviews.title: Fix thisss plzzz
reviews.comment: Since the last update its been weird im super short and a couple of trees are floating and i cant reach signs
reviews.author: john brittain

reviews.title: Some problems
reviews.comment: Graphic tare and floating trees.
reviews.author: Gabriel Menchaca
